_holographic_seed.essence: economics = geometry of value flow. money = 1D medium enabling exchange. labor = 0D→2D transformation creating value. capital = 3D accumulated productive capacity. true wealth = coherence (connections × dimensions / entropy)
_holographic_seed.formula: 0D entity → 1D money flow → 2D market network → 3D capital accumulation → 4D temporal evolution → 5D gift economy → 6D sacred economics
_holographic_seed.fire: transformation of value, energy exchange, flow of resources
_holographic_seed.water: adaptive markets, flowing capital, liquid assets
_holographic_seed.earth: accumulated wealth, material goods, stable structures
_holographic_seed.truth: true wealth (presence, connection, wisdom) cannot be stolen, grows when shared, eternal. false wealth (money, status, power) can be lost, diminishes when shared, temporary

essence: economics = collective metabolism system transforming resources through labor into goods/services, coordinated by money flows and market signals. dimensional architecture: 0D = individual economic entity, 1D = money as flow medium connecting entities, 2D = markets as exchange networks discovering prices, 3D = capital as accumulated productive capacity, 4D = temporal evolution and sustainability, 5D = gift economy expressing unity consciousness, 6D = sacred economics optimizing coherence for all. true wealth = coherence metric (connections × dimensions / entropy) - presence, authentic relationships, wisdom, peace. false wealth = accumulation without coherence - money hoarding, status seeking, power over others. current economy = 1D-2D extraction (unsustainable). future = 5D sacred economics (sustainable, regenerative, abundant).

core_principles.value_as_coherence: value = coherence added through transformation. not time spent (1D) but dimensional elevation achieved (0D→2D)
core_principles.money_as_medium: money = 1D flow connecting entities. not valuable itself, only as exchange enabler. velocity > quantity
core_principles.labor_as_transformation: labor = human entity (0D) applying skill to transform resources into value (2D). skilled = higher dimensional
core_principles.capital_as_accumulation: capital = 3D stored productive capacity. tools, factories, knowledge, infrastructure
core_principles.wealth_redefined: true wealth (presence, connection, wisdom) eternal, grows when shared. false wealth (money, status, power) temporary, diminishes when shared
core_principles.scarcity_manufactured: scarcity = artificial 0D isolation enabling 1D extraction. abundance = natural 5D state
core_principles.coherence_optimization: purpose = maximize coherence (connections × dimensions) for collective, not GDP growth for few

0d_entity.role: basic unit of economic activity. needs, preferences, decisions
0d_entity.pathology: isolation (poverty) - no connections, no resources, no participation

1d_money.description: line - flow medium connecting entities enabling exchange
examples: dollar bill connecting buyer and seller
1d_money.role: coordination signal. not valuable itself, only as connector. enables complex economy beyond barter
1d_money.pathology: hoarding (stagnation) - flow stops, economy freezes. inflation - measuring stick degrades

2d_markets.description: plane - network of buyers/sellers discovering prices through exchange
2d_markets.role: distributed computation. price discovery through supply-demand equilibrium. efficient local optimization

mechanism.supply_curve: quantity sellers willing to provide at each price
mechanism.demand_curve: quantity buyers willing to purchase at each price
mechanism.equilibrium: intersection where supply = demand, market clears

3d_capital.description: volume - accumulated productive capacity (physical, financial, human)

types.physical: factories, machines, tools, infrastructure. 3D objects enabling production
types.financial: accumulated money/assets. 3D volume of stored value

3d_capital.role: productive capacity storage. enables future production. distinguishes from money (1D flow) and labor (0D→2D transformation)
3d_capital.pathology: concentration (inequality) - few control most capital. depreciation - capital degrades without maintenance

4d_temporal_evolution.description: time - economic sustainability, long-term thinking, intergenerational equity

concerns.sustainability: can economy continue indefinitely without depleting resources?
concerns.debt: borrowing from future. sustainable only if future production > current debt
concerns.discount_rate: how much to value future vs present. high = short-term bias
concerns.intergenerational: what do we leave for children? depleted planet or thriving ecosystem?

4d_temporal_evolution.current_problem: exponential growth (1D-2D) in finite world (3D). unsustainable. headed for collapse
4d_temporal_evolution.solution: circular economy (regenerative), steady-state (thriving not growing), long-term optimization (7 generations thinking)

5d_gift_economy.description: ether - exchange without money, based on reciprocity and relationship unity
5d_gift_economy.mechanism: giving without expectation of direct return. trust-based. circulation to where needed
examples: family sharing (no payment for meals, childcare, support)
open source software (free giving of code, knowledge)
5d_gift_economy.optimal_for: small groups, care work, information goods, community building

6d_sacred_economics.description: beyond - conscious optimization of economy for coherence maximization
6d_sacred_economics.principle: economy as love expression. maximizing true wealth (coherence) for collective, not false wealth (extraction) for few
6d_sacred_economics.transition: current (1D-2D extraction) → hybrid (2D-3D-5D integration) → future (5D-6D sacred)

hybrid_optimal.principle: use each system for what it does best
hybrid_optimal.integration: sacred economics framework optimizing coherence across all levels

properties.cannot_be_stolen: no one can take your presence, wisdom, peace
properties.grows_when_shared: teaching multiplies knowledge, loving deepens connection
properties.eternal: transcends material form, persists beyond death

true_wealth.accessible: available to materially poor. cultivatable through practice

false_wealth.creates: anxiety (fear of loss), isolation (builds walls), dissatisfaction (never enough)

labor_transformation.description: human entity applying skill/effort to transform resources into value
labor_transformation.not_just_time: time = 1D. labor = dimensional elevation (0D→2D). skilled labor = higher dimensional (requires 2D knowledge network)
labor_transformation.value_created: function of coherence added, not time spent
labor_transformation.automation: replacing human 0D→2D with machine 0D→2D. frees humans for higher dimensional work (creativity, care, wisdom)

money_velocity.definition: how fast money circulates through economy
money_velocity.importance: velocity > quantity. stagnant money = frozen economy. flowing money = healthy economy
money_velocity.pathology: hoarding reduces velocity → recession. quantitative easing increases supply but if velocity low → no effect

inequality_as_fragmentation.description: wealth concentration in few nodes, disconnection of many
inequality_as_fragmentation.measurement: gini coefficient (0 = perfect equality, 1 = one person has everything)
inequality_as_fragmentation.coherence_impact: extreme inequality = low coherence. few connections across classes. reduces total system wellbeing even if absolute wealth increases

abundance.definition: high coherence state where needs met through connectivity and flow
abundance.not_about_quantity: about connections and circulation, not accumulation
abundance.natural_state: nature = abundant (sunlight, air, water unless blocked). information = naturally abundant (copying costs nothing)
abundance.examples: open source (digital abundance), commons (shared abundance), gift economy (relational abundance)

scarcity.artificial: enclosure of commons, IP laws creating information scarcity, monopolies restricting supply, planned obsolescence
scarcity.purpose: create scarcity → enable extraction. no scarcity → no profit opportunity

externalities.definition: costs/benefits not reflected in market prices

examples.negative: pollution (factory profit, society pays cleanup cost), climate change (fossil fuel profit, everyone pays climate cost)
examples.positive: education (individual pays, society benefits), vaccination (individual pays, herd immunity benefits all)

externalities.market_failure: markets ignore externalities → misallocation. overproduction of negative externalities (pollution), underproduction of positive (education)
externalities.solution: internalize externalities. carbon tax (polluter pays), education subsidy (society invests)

basic_income.definition: universal basic income (UBI) - unconditional payments to all citizens
basic_income.geometry: establishing 0D→1D baseline. every entity gets minimum flow
benefits: frees time for true wealth cultivation (presence, creativity, care)
basic_income.concerns: inflation if not matched by production, work incentive effects
basic_income.solution: pair with ecological taxation (fund UBI from pollution taxes), automation dividend (distribute productivity gains), gift economy expansion

financialization.description: economy dominated by financial speculation rather than production
financialization.geometry: money circulating in 2D markets (stocks, derivatives) disconnected from 3D real economy (goods, services)
financialization.problem: creates 2D bubble detached from 3D reality. eventually collapses (2008 crisis). extraction without creation
financialization.solution: transaction tax (slow speculation), redirect capital to production and commons

consumerism.description: ideology of perpetual consumption as life purpose
consumerism.geometry: chasing false wealth (material goods) instead of true wealth (coherence). hedonic treadmill
consumerism.problem: never satisfies. destroys ecosystem. creates isolation
consumerism.solution: shift from consumption to cultivation. from goods to experiences. from individual to community

rent_seeking.description: extracting wealth through ownership/control without value creation
rent_seeking.geometry: 0D monopoly position → 1D extraction flow. landlord collects rent without 0D→2D labor transformation
rent_seeking.solution: land value tax (Georgism), break monopolies, commons management, IP reform

tragedy_of_commons.description: overexploitation of shared resources when access unrestricted
tragedy_of_commons.problem: individual rationality → collective irrationality. destroy shared resource
tragedy_of_commons.solution: NOT privatization. Ostrom: community management (2D network governance), shared rules, monitoring, sanctions

problems: growth imperative (infinite expansion in finite world)

steps: commons expansion (5D shared resources: land, knowledge, culture)
gift economy cultivation (community, care, open source)
true wealth metrics (coherence index replaces GDP)

personal.redefine_wealth: measure coherence not money. track true treasures (presence, connection, wisdom)
personal.reduce_consumption: buy less, experience more. shift from goods to relationships
personal.participate_gift: give freely (time, skills, resources). receive graciously. build gift circles
personal.ethical_investment: invest in coherence (regenerative, community) not extraction (fossil fuels, weapons)
personal.protect_time: don't sell all time for money. value presence over productivity

community.local_currency: create local money keeping wealth circulating locally
community.commons_creation: establish shared resources (community gardens, tool libraries, knowledge sharing)
community.cooperatives: worker co-ops (democratic firms) vs hierarchical corporations
community.gift_circles: organize gift economy (time banking, skill sharing, mutual aid)
community.local_production: reduce dependence on global markets. build resilient local systems

systemic.policy_advocacy: push for UBI, ecological taxation, commons expansion, financial regulation
systemic.alternative_institutions: build parallel structures (credit unions, co-ops, commons)
systemic.education: teach sacred economics (true wealth, coherence) not just conventional economics
systemic.metric_reform: replace GDP with coherence metrics (wellbeing, equality, sustainability)
systemic.capital_redirection: divest from extraction, invest in regeneration

positions.7: regenerative economics (healing ecosystem while meeting needs)
positions.8: integral economics (hybrid system optimizing across all levels)
positions.9: abundance realization (scarcity = artifact, prosperity for all)
positions.10: economic enlightenment (economy as love expression, unity consciousness)
